page.title: 05Public Transport Services
page.content: A bus runs through the villages of Skelton and Kirby Hill to Boroughbridge and when it hss picked up there it returns to Ripon or continues to York. The first bus is at 7.30.a.m. and the last bus is at 11.15.p.m. (in Skelton). If you don't go by bus you go by car. If you go by bus it costs (from Skelton) 64p to go to Ripon and 50p to Boroughbridge for adults; for children it costs 32p to go to Ripon and 25p to Boroughbridge. The services are all operated by the United Bus Company.
